column1: '''''Seventeen''''' '''January 1967''', is an issue of the American magazine ''Seventeen''. The article "J.R.R. Tolkien Talks about the Discovery of Middle-earth, the Origins of Elvish" by [[Richard Plotz]] includes extracts (pp. 92-93, 118) from an [[Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: interview with Tolkien]].<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=53600 Seventeen. January 1967] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 27 October 2011)</ref>
